testcase.name: New User Order with Bank Transfer Test
testcase.system-out: Given User goes to url......................................................passed When User ckicks accept button on popup.....................................passed When User adds a physical product to basket................................passed When User ckicks accept button on popup.....................................passed And User clicks add to basket button........................................passed And User clicks my basket icon..............................................passed And User clicks buy icon....................................................passed And User clicks Now Register Button.........................................passed And The user fills in the information in the form with valid values.........passed And User click Register Button..............................................passed And User verifies Account Created message is visible........................passed And User clicks Add adress button...........................................passed And The user fills in the information on the address page...................passed Then User verifies that they have successfully added the address............passed And User clicks OK button...................................................passed And User clicks my basket icon..............................................passed And User clicks buy icon....................................................passed And User clicks continue button.............................................passed And User clicks Bank transfer radio button..................................passed And User clicks continue button.............................................passed And User clicks preinformation check box....................................passed And User confirm order button...............................................passed
